query: When did I receive the vaccine to produce active immunity in my medical record?
resource_summaries:
This is a summary of an encounter where a vaccine was administered to Mrs. Edythe31 Morar593 at NEWTON-WELLESLEY HOSPITAL by Dr. Darrick836 Franecki195 on March 30, 2021.
The patient received a completed dose of the SARS-COV-2 (COVID-19) mRNA vaccine at Newton-Wellesley Hospital on April 27, 2021.
answer: Based on your medical record, you received a completed dose of the SARS-COV-2 (COVID-19) mRNA vaccine at Newton-Wellesley Hospital on April 27, 2021.
